content: this hat knits up quick with just 1 skein of woolstok tweed a lovely braided cable detail framed by some stockinette topped with a fluffy pom pom this hat would make a great gift for a knit worthy person in your life yarn 1 skein blue sky fibers woolstok tweed 109 yards/1oo g sample knit in colourway midsummer night gauge 16 sts by 24 row equals 4 by 4 in stockinette in the round before blocking needles 5 mm us 8 16 circular needles 5 5 mm us 9 16 circular needles 5 5 mm us 9 dpn s or long circular needle for magic loop for top of hat or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch marker darning needle cable needle pom pom optional finished size circumference 14 35 5cm height 9 23cm
